website_summaries.verdict: A nice step up from a character sleeping bag that can really keep your child warm while camping.
pros: Nice length that should last until your child is big enough for an adult bag
Zipper is well designed to reduce snagging
Has an interior pocket for storage
Fits easily back into its carrying bag
cons: Strings and zippers on these bags could be stronger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for camping in Florida
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sleeping bag for my 11 year old who was scheduled to go on a Boy Scout camping trip within a few days and we needed something in a hurry. He said it was fairly cold out that weekend and this sleeping bag kept him plenty warm and the zipper worked perfectly. He is fairly tall for his age (5'3) and we were worried it would be too small, but he said it was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pottgen

customer_reviews.title: My four year old loves this thick warm bag!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yo absolutely loves this sleeping bag! It is very very sturdy and well made. We pur hased this for a family camping trip and my 4 yo has been using it every night for almost a month in his bed! I would repurchase this again in a heartbeat. I have washed and dryed this several times at home now and it's held up really well. I have no complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Realistically not very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I think this review has to be taken with a grain of salt. I am an outdoor gear reviewer and I know what I was purchasing here when I bought it for my nephew. It's a budget bag so I didn't expect a whole lot. I wanted him to have something to cuddle in to for his sleepovers with friends. The material on the inside of the bag did not feel very soft and the sleeping bag was extremely hard to roll up and get back in the bag, making it not so kid friendly at all. For what it is, it's fine though.
customer_reviews.author: LukePhoto

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and works well. Problem is it is not as described. it is 60 inches not 66 inches. I have another youth sized coleman, that is actually 66 inches, and when I zipped them together this one fell 6 inches short. Not a big deal, just annoying. Also I knew the inside would be yellow/lime, but the picture shows the back as grey. The item I received the backside is yellow lime as well as the inside. Not a big deal, but makes me wonder if I received a different product, or not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Comfy durable sleeping bag for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag for my son's first summer at overnight camp in Prescott, AZ. He said it was very comfortable. It's not flimsy material so it would be good even in colder weather. It's even long enough for a short adult (I'm 5 ft tall) to use if needed. I also like the fact that it can be washed in cold water and gentle detergent if needed. But after a week of camp, it was in great condition and I didn't have a reason to wash it. He can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: DirtyDi

customer_reviews.title: ripped after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: originally bought 2 of these. after using just a handful of times, one of them ripped at the seams. bought another one and after only 3 uses it has ripped as well. because they are not used often we are unable to return them. not happy with these purchases at all.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fencik

customer_reviews.title: Carrying bag is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10yr old son to go on his 4th grade camping trip. It kept him warm and perfect size for him. But the carrying bag that came with this is a joke. He had to put it in a trash bag to carry the sleeping bag home. There is no way he could've squeezed the sleeping bag back into the carrying bag. Its a nice sleeping bag but you would have to find another bag to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Materialust

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sleeping bag for my son to get geared up for Scout and family camping trips. He was so excited when the Amazon box showed up on the porch and he just had to try out his sleeping bag right away. The playful fireflies on the outside are so cute, and he loves the color of the inside. Mom review: the zipper is very easy for a child to be able to handle, and I really like the fact that the zipper doesn't 'tangle' when opening or closing the sleeping bag. I also really like how easily it rolls up for storage. Overall a great sleeping bag for a 5 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: WTH!  Did you send used merchandise or is it just damaged?!?
customer_reviews.text: Storage bag was torn in 3 different places. Looks like it was previously used when it was supposed to be brand res!
customer_reviews.author: CZT

customer_reviews.title: our granddaughter loved it. She used it the entire week we ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this bag 5 stars but for the fact that it has ties rather than an elastic strap to wrap it up with. Since it is designed for younger users, I think the elastic would make it much easier for them to back away. That being said, our granddaughter loved it. She used it the entire week we were in Maine, and was very happy with it. Nice bag for inside the camper...maynot be heavy enough for tent camping.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Reffner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper and lining
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is challenging to say the least to zip and unzip for washing. The inside of this bag is slippery nylon which I really dislike. I was expecting a flannel lining based on photos. I don't see any soft cuff as described on this bag. It is an adequate bag but not what I expected from a Coleman sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: So far these seem well made for the price and so are a great value. The zipper is nicely designed to keep it from catching the material. The boys (2.5 and 5 y/o) are using these to "camp" out in the living room and they'll be great for summer camping outdoors. Very satisfied. *** Update; 12/13/2018 *** About a year in and these have proven durable (with indoor use). The kids use these to stay up late and watch movies mostly, but they are great for indoor use (not too hot). Hopefully this year, we'll get some outdoor use as well.
customer_reviews.author: NickB

customer_reviews.title: Great youth sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. This is definitely a youth sleeping bag (as stated above). To give you more of an idea of size, I'm 5'7" and there's no way I can use this as a sleeping bag. My daughter is 3'10" and it fits her perfectly with room to grow. The colors are really pretty and girly. This bag is also really soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sleeping bag. We bought it for my 9 year old daughter. She’s in the 50th percentile for height and weight and it’s got plenty of room to grow into. The colors are vibrant and it feels like a medium warmth. It’s not thin if that’s what you’re looking for. It’s medium as it’s not too heavy either. The zipper is tricky though. She can’t completely get it unzipped and I have to help her. It’s actually a little hard for me as well. Great sleeping bag for a kid but a tricky zipper at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not really Glow, but other than that it is a great bag.
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo Nephew loves it. I actually let him pick one out on Amazon and this is the one he chose. Pretty cold nights here and it keeps him nice and toasty. Very comfortable and looks great, seems like decent build quality as well. The only negative which is not really a negative is that the glow in the dark bugs printed on the outside do not really glow. I mean if you turn off the lights you can see them very very faintly but I would not really consider it glowing. So Glow should be taken out of the description, kind of false advertising when people are expecting a real glow.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fun, washable, kid-sized
customer_reviews.text: A good size for a first sleeping bag. Warm bright colors and it washes well. Your kid will never be able to roll it back up and forget the ties that roll it up anyway...they aren't centered properly to hold it closed. I can tackle the rolling up and keeping it tidy by jamming it back into the bag. I suggest letting out the extra stitches in the bag to accommodate this - it's a bit hard to see but there is a seam that is sewn intentionally smaller than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid-Weight Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: The pink sleeping bag was exactly as advertised. Nice quality, easy to roll with the side toggles, zipper worked perfectly, and the color was my daughter's dream come true. It only got to be about 55 at night when we camped with it, but my 3 year old was perfectly comfortable, even without socks. She will have plenty of room to grow into his for years. Highly recommend. I am giving 4 stars, because I also ordered the blue/green camo one and that is MUCH darker and unattractive in person. Still functions perfectly, but not as nice to look at as the one pictured.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: it's a great little sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the actual "pink" sleeping bag is actually a deep purple and not pink at all. The product photo is misleading in that regard. However, it's a great little sleeping bag, equal in quality to the adult version.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Time fo better bags
customer_reviews.text: Excellent children's sleeping bag. Moved up to new bags when we started to camp in the mountains where it gets into the 40's at night even in summer. These bags are comfortable, very warm and made well. The girls (9 & 7) opened them up the day they arrived and got in them to watch TV. Though school will start soon I am sure they will get a lot of use for sleep overs and just watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: CarlS0525

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag for our purposes.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our almost 5 year old who has started having sleepovers with his grandparents and cousins. He loves it. It’s plenty big enough for him to grow into it for several years. It seems sturdy enough for our use, which is indoor - in a living room fort, watching a movie with the neighborhood gang, or sleepovers on a cot. We’re not campers, so can’t speak to outdoor quality.
customer_reviews.author: RJTandAMT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves having her own "real" sleeping bag. Merits include the fact that it doesn't have characters on it and it keeps her warm! Something to consider is that you'll likely have to help the child you're buying this for to tie it when putting it away. Positive- There is enough room for it to fit in the storage bag if it isn't rolled up as tightly as possible.
customer_reviews.author: evansstac

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this sleeping bag this summer! I didn’t even realize that the lighting bugs glowed in the dark when we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: Good Kids sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as his first sleeping bag. It is very big, which I like cause it will last longer. It's okay to zipper, he struggled a little bit to zipper it himself. At a few times it snagged on the sleeping bag. It's impossible fold up though. It take a while to learn the right way to fold it up so it isn't huge. It doesn't seem like it will be warm enough though to sleep outside with unless it's a really warm night.
customer_reviews.author: melissaM

customer_reviews.title: Great kids sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my nephews for Xmas. They are 4 and I anticipate they will be able to use these until they are close to 10. They were really excited about the green interior and the fireflies (although the glow factor wasn’t really showing up). I am impressed with the quality- they are actual Sleeping bags so they can use them when we go camping in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag carrying bag was ripped when it arrived so is defective. I tried to have it replaced through customer service but they said it’s not covered by the warrany, only the sleeping bag itself. I could return the whole item for a refund, but that seems more trouble than it’s worth and it was a present from Santa so further complicates things.
customer_reviews.author: David Duran

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture -- NOT pink as shown, but DARK PURPLE
customer_reviews.text: I realize now the product name is "Coleman Plum Fun 45 Youth Sleeping Bag", but the picture clearly shows a pink sleeping bag. What I got, was a dark purple sleeping bag. The "Plum" in the name now makes sense...but Amazon should post a picture that accurately depicts the actual product. No, it's not my monitor settings -- I purchase clothes all the time and the colors come as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a trip we took for my kiddos. They loved em! They kept them warm, easy to roll up, light weight, condition was perfect and zippers are easy even for my 3yr old. They want to sleep in them all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mauren Inman

customer_reviews.title: My girls love them. They have a special zipper that wont ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls love them. They have a special zipper that wont snag the bag when zipping or unzipping it. Also comes with some hooks so you can fold it and roll it perfectly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tavis A.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 3 day AT hike. My 8yo son loves this bag and actually uses it in his bed all the time. Extra points for glow in the dark design. It unexpectedly got down to 30 degrees one night and he did fine with this bag. Got a little cold in the morning but I was expecting him to be much colder. Compresses well too (since I have to carry it!)
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: My son love, loves
customer_reviews.text: My son love, loves, loves this sleeping bag. It's a great item for a boy that is transitioning into a bigger boy and doesn't want all the fluffy characters or superheros anymore. It's a great quality. We washed it, he's uses it for sleepovers, etc. One of the best things I ever bought on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TrueReview

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for travel and they are comfortable enough and pretty durable based on the abuse that they have been through so far. I especially like the bags that come with them which are very useful. The rolled up sleeping bags easily fit back into them as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy inside fabric. Nice carrying bag. Great zipper safety feature not only to keep fingers safe but helps to keep the material from getting stuck in the zipper. My 3 year d will be able to use this for a few years as there is plenty of space to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Glasford

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We have this to our 18 month old for Christmas and we love the thickness as well as the very smooth zippers our little one can open alone from either the inside or outside. It is well padded and could be used in carpet alone. The glow in the dark lightning bugs are a great touch. We're excited to use it camping or at sleepovers with grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, comes with a usable stuff sack
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a sleep over and summer camping. Its perfect, soft and not too thin. Quality seems good. Comes with an over-sized stuff sack, so you can actually get the sleeping bag into it. Most stuff sacks are way too small to be practical. I am happy this
customer_reviews.author: orange

customer_reviews.title: Has other uses too: anti cat hair
customer_reviews.text: It did machine wash well on gentle in cool water. Nice bed cover because cat hair doesn't cling or weave into it. I do enjoy dear cats on my bed. Only because I use it on top of beds, it would be nice if the one outside logo could come off. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel fan

customer_reviews.title: My kiddos love them
customer_reviews.text: Got these gor my 5 and 7 year old and they love them. Great for warmer weather camping and sleepovers. They do not have a compression bag so if your planning in doing real hiking or camping you might want to pick a compression bag up
customer_reviews.author: Robert Peters

customer_reviews.title: Fun and good size.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, comfortable, nice size. My daughter is about 4’9”, and has plenty of room to grow in this bag. The image doesn’t show the color well, it is a fairly dark purple on the outside. The pattern inside is fun. There is a small velcro pocket on the bag that could be really useful for a flashlight, tissue, something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R Houser

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my four year old twins and they love them. Nice and warm, perfect size with room to grow. Glows in the dark, and has a nice big zipper handle that my kids can operate. Also has an interior pocket.
customer_reviews.author: R Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these. I bought two of them for my kids ( 3 and 5) to use for camping this summer. They worked great for that and now my kids use them all the time inside for their “sleepovers”. I like how they roll up-the ties are nice to keep them together, although the buttons are more annoying than helpful. The stuff sacks work well too.
customer_reviews.author: Katalatalnat

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag for kids. My daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great sleeping bag for my daughter's overnight with her class. It kept her nice and warm. It took her a little bit of practice to learn how to roll it. She never had a sleeping bag before and this was a great one to have. It was perfect for her field trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the storage bag expansion process!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag itself seems to be of good quality and beautiful design and color upon initial out of box inspection, however, the storage bag is quite thin and immediately unraveled at the seems after expansion process. One has to be extremely careful not to rip the wrong seem, or use too much force, which is VERY hard to do as the expansion seems are sitting right on top of the actual seem holding the bag together. This was dissapointing but not a huge deal for me as the sleeping bag also has tie straps for storage and transportation. I hope to add a more thorough review after my daughter uses it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: samantha lynn johnson

customer_reviews.title: Was warm enough but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag was exactly as described and we just used it for the first time camping a few weeks ago. As far as quality, the seam between the pink and purple part is already frayed. It was used two nights by a 5 year old so there wasn't a whole lot of wear to cause such an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Warm and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a warm, durable sleeping bag for a youngster. We bought it for a three year old and she will be able to use it for many years as she has plenty of room to grow into it. The size is probably best for a child aged 5-9, but like I said it will work for our three year old. Bright blue color and the camo inside is cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Sally311

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute!
customer_reviews.text: These children's sleeping bags with the fireflies are so cute! I bought them for my two granddaughters when we were taking a trip to visit family in Arizona. I don't see the fireflies glowing though, which was a big selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits good for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 9 year old. Has worked great and he will be able to use it for at least a few more years. He likes the bugs that flow in the dark. I think it needs a barrier to keep the cold from coming thru the tent floor even for summer camping.
customer_reviews.author: Daisygirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son before our first camping trip. He LOVES it! I have to admit that I'm a little jealous that my sleeping bag isn't as adorable as this one! The lightening bugs glow in the dark long enough for him to go to sleep. He says it's very comfortable too. It appears to be very good quality and kept him warm overnight in temps in 40's. We loved it so much we purchased another for our 8 year old son as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: String tie fell off before even being use
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my daughter’s first camp trip. We open the sleeping bag up and my girls was just Holding on the the string lightly and it fell offs The string that ties the sleeping bag broke when we didn’t even use the bag yet. My daughter was so upset. I couldn’t return it since I wrote the name on before we open it up. Beside that I didn’t hear any complaints from my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy T

customer_reviews.title: Quality sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summer sleeping bag for our daughter! We use it tent camping. Light weight, squishes nicely in the bag. Easy to wash. I air dry it once done in the washer, and it drys in no time! Has kept her comfortably warm on nights in the upper 50’s/lower 60’s.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 yo..its cute..came a day early.. nicely packaged..and he loves it..the bugs are cute and he loves catching Fire flies..i would not recommend anybody past 7 years old to use as its long but the width a short
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than those character sleeping bags
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Much better than those character sleeping bags. I chose to get this for my daughter because I figured it would hold up well for her girl scout camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime T

customer_reviews.title: Overall, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit for my 7 year old. Seems well sewn and the zippers are durable so far. Was very warm. Have used one time and my only complaint is not having an easier system for tying it up after rolling it. I think buckles that could clip together and be tightened or something similar would be nice. Overall, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it's easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sleeping bag for my 5-year-old daughter, and she loves it! The colors are bright, it's warm, and it's easy to wash. I'm not great at folding it up to fit back into the bag that comes with it, but that may be due to lack of effort on my part... Beyond that, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good for overnights
customer_reviews.text: The size and strength of the sleeping bags were good for my 6 and 8 year old grandchildren for sleepovers. They are fun and attractive. My only complaint is that they are made of slippery and puffy fabric, not cozy. Also, don't rip off the manufacturers tags on the bottom of the bags...they are sewn into the seam and the seam opens if you try to tear them.
customer_reviews.author: PegCat

customer_reviews.title: Can’t zip it back up
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’m missing something because it is impossible to zip the bag together. I can’t figure it out and couldn’t find any Demi’s online. Too bad because otherwise it’s a nice sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M Gorcyca

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for summer camp. We loved the colors and the light weight. My son sleeps hot and he did work his way out in the night, sweating. I dont think this would be the case with all kids. He is just hot natured.
customer_reviews.author: Staplej

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, and perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We took our 2.5 & 5 year old sons tent camping in Joshua Tree NP and got one of these sleeping bags for each of them. They were perfect! Super comfortable, kept them warm (even in the middle of a huge windstorm), and they loved the glow in the dark designs. I would definitely recommend these to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Kym White

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Bugs are adorable and something the kiddos loved showing off
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sleeping bag for my children to take to camp during the summer. They had no complaints what so ever and ended up wanting to sleep with it when they got home from camp! I am 5'0" and I was able to shimmy my way into it and it covered up to my shoulders. Glowing Bugs are adorable and something the kiddos loved showing off!
customer_reviews.author: Kala Sobaszek

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy, and good size for littles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to go camping he is 4. It worked great! He loved the camp pattern and he fit great with room to grow. This would be perfect for ages 4-10. My 20 year old fit perfectly but no room to grow. It was 50 °F at night when we camped and my son slept great and said he didn't get cold.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Flores

customer_reviews.title: She loved it though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece- very cute, but not sure how warm it will be. She loved it though.I should have researched it some more though. The inside of the sleeping bag is the same as the outside. I prefer a bag with some sort of flannel. It easily rolled up and fit back in the bag once you follow the instructions on where to tear the two spots on the outer bag to make it bigger
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sleeping bags
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoy their sleeping bags but I wasn't super impressed that you have to tie the sleeping bag to get it back in it's bag! It's a pain! Also, they are so silky that my kids slip out of them during the night! Other than that, they are cute and my kids like them!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to use while attending sleepovers. This is the perfect size for a child and easy to roll up and put back in the carrier bag. It also has a pocket for a flashlight that could be useful if we were camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like any kind of silky sleeping bags but I ordered a pink and blue one for my step kid twins that are 8 and I love them. they're very soft and almost as tall as me and I'm 5'7. I was worrying they were going to be little kid sized
customer_reviews.author: KaLee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Young Campers
customer_reviews.text: I love the Coleman youth sleeping bags! There is a little insert inside for a glow stick and the neon yellow makes it all the more bright for a young kid camping. My 7 year old went on a week overnight camp and had no problems sleeping through the night. By the way, she is normally afraid of the dark. I got Illumi-Bug exactly for that reason. Happy camping!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It'll do
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping and at night when temp is in mid 50s my kiddo still complained its cold. Being warm climate residents we're not accustomed to cold so I bought sleeping bag liners for our next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brendo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my tween daughter’s Girl Scout sleepovers. Good quality, and the bag has a carrying strap that she can throw over her shoulders when there’s no room in her overnight bag, which can be very helpful when they have far to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Snow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughter. The color is great, its soft, it held up nicely in the wash, and kept her warm. They are large. I'd say they would last a kid through elementary school.
customer_reviews.author: N.G.

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a cold weather bag and it is very slick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag for my grandson for summer camping trip. He was comfortable and warm. My only problem was that it is very slick, inside & out so by morning it was all twisted around him.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this sleeping bag, me kind of. It's very cozy and comfortable. However we went camping and the temp dropped to about 53 degrees at night, and my kids got cold in their sleeping bags. They even hand on clothes in their sleeping bags. So that's a bummer, but at least it's comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Masterfield

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's 5th birthday and she loves it. We camped inside last week and outside yesterday. Perfect fit for her and she really likes the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose these after looking at so many! I got them for 2 and 4 year old grandkids visit after Christmas. They chose these and the carpeted floor over the bed. We zipped them together for fun too. Washed up great! I followed the instructions. They will love them in the camper too this summer. I am sure these will last a few years! I am 4' 11" and I fit in them too. Best bang for my buck I am sure!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Rochon

customer_reviews.title: Great for camp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to take to 4H camp and he’s camped out in his room with it every day this summer! It’s lightweight and easy to roll up and put away. It’s held up way better than the previous sleeping bag he had so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleepovers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my daughter was invited to a sleepover party, and her old Frozen sleeping bag just wouldn’t do the job. She’s about 4’9” and it was perfect. Nice quality, great price, and cute colors. They didn’t sleep outdoors, so I can’t vouch for it’s warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Potato

customer_reviews.title: Bag rolls up and fits into carry bag nicely. Light enough that our 3
customer_reviews.text: The 'ties' that hold the sleeping bag in half while you roll it are cheaply attached. 1 is already near breaking, but they're a minor convenience feature. Bag rolls up and fits into carry bag nicely. Light enough that our 3.5 yr old daughter was able to carry it into the camp site from the car. She loves the colors and design. Good warmth for non-extreme conditions.
customer_reviews.author: U.N. Known

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: My son recently used it during our camping trip. The night temperature was around 50 degrees inside our tent, but it kept my son warm on top of our air mattress. It is light weight and has thick padding. So far, I am satisfied with it, and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A well made sleeping bag and a great size for a smaller child!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sleeping bag for our 4 year old granddaughter. The size will be great for some years to come. It is well made and she is very warm when she is inside it. And it’s pink..a big bonus for her!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Svoboda

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the glowing fireflies
customer_reviews.text: My son is happy with his new sleeping bag. It was comfy and kept him warm in an unexpectedly chilly (30 deg) night. He loves the glowing fireflies, a great touch to make it special.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy H Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sleeping bags.
customer_reviews.text: Just received those... bought for my granddaughters. I am pleasantly surprised by the quality. They are excellent and the price very reasonable. Thank you Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, read measurements
customer_reviews.text: Very good Coleman quality. Very narrow, read measurements. I don't care for the tie ends, I prefer the elastic straps. Fits in bag, but you have to rip off the out side tag to make the bag size bigger = stupid. Fits in bag without having to be tied up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My daughter (4) LOVES this thing.
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this sleeping bag she sometimes sleeps on the floor in her bedroom just so she can use it and she asks to sleep on the living room floor all the time so she can use it. its really really soft and seems to do well to keep her warm
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Made very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is for our 8 year old grandson. It’s made very well and we were actually able to get it back in the carring bag. It would be nice if it were just a few inches wider. Our grandson is very slender, but don’t know how it would work for someone who is large.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old was excited by the fun camo n slippery fabric. Of course is was long for him so I just tucked the extra under his cot n he will grow into it for years. So glad it wasn't that flannel inside because he "runs hot" like his daddy n would have been too warm. He slept like an angel. The plow zipper is fantastic so easy.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is so in love with this sleeping bag and the carrying strap she ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so in love with this sleeping bag and the carrying strap she wore it around the house like a backpack Christmas morning! She's excited for her next sleepover so she can use it.
customer_reviews.author: C Max

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandkids (6 and 11). They love them. Good quality and lightweight. I’m not sure how much protection they offer in cold weather, as I live in Phoenix. Good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for summer camping. It was too hot to sleep in it and the fabric felt sticky. Maybe would be better for colder months
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag for 9 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag for my daughter. We just use it for vacations and sleeping at grandma's , no camping yet. It is the perfect length and very cozy. Cute pattern on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old needed a sleeping bag for camp. We found this and it was perfect! It is not quite as wide as an adult sleeping bag, which we knew before purchasing, and it ended up working out great for what we needed it for. I have washed it once and it held up just fine. Overall, a very nice quality and very warm sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Coleman kid sleeping bags
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of the Coleman kids sleeping bags for my grandson and my great niece and nephews just before Xmas for a planned overnight sleep over on Xmas eve. The sleeping bags arrived before Xmas (Yay!) and were a hit with all the kids. The sleepers are beautiful, they're durable and well-made. The kids especially liked that they were reversible and each bag came with a carrying cover! I highly recommend these Coleman sleeping bags and would order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra T.

customer_reviews.title: The Color Does Not Match the Description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue sleeping bag and was disappointed when it arrived. The sleeping bag was a dull green. There was some blue in the camo lining and the bag cover, but the majority of the bag was green. I did not unroll the bag to check the quality because I simply wanted blue and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids were so excited to get these. Perfect for sleeping over friends and for camping as long as it is not extreme weather. Easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: TAMARA LUDINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old for camp and she loved it. She said it was nice and warm. She loved the little lightning bugs that glow in the dark on the bag. Would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Great, warm comfy sleeping bag. Bought for my oldest granddaughter for sleepovers. She now uses on her bed every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought for great grandson for when we all go camping in the spring so he hasn’t used it yet. It looks to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it. Washes well.
customer_reviews.text: I have already washed this a few times and it is holding up perfectly. My daughter loves the colors and pattern. The inside is cozy and doesn't have that static-prone, strange feel of the inside of so many sleeping bags. It is smoother but still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice, cool fabric that doesn't scratch or catch like ...
customer_reviews.text: We've owned this sleeping bag for a few weeks now, and have used it several times. It's a nice, cool fabric that doesn't scratch or catch like some do. I would buy this again. The color is vibrant and attractive and the plow zipper has completely eliminated the common problem of zippers getting stuck on the fabric. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: angelinamax

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: She keeps warm and hasn't frozen to death. Shame. Was looking forward to collecting her life insurance for my bills. Oh well, guess it works. Highly recommended sleeping bag. Pretty too
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: Fireflies are peeling off
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this! She loves that it glows in the dark. Unfortunately, the fireflies that glow in the dark are peeling off the sleeping bag. She got this for Christmas so didn’t last very long at all. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: ADAM P.

customer_reviews.title: Really like the size and color
customer_reviews.text: Really like the size and color. My kids used these in the house for days after they got them for Christmas. Unfortunately the seem between zipper and fabric has already come apart. Luckily I know how to sew and fixed it. She wasn't even that rough on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom cubed

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES her purple sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Coleman sleeping bag! She used it for two days INSIDE the house when we first gave it to her and she slept well; she slept well inside in her bedroom. When we took her camping she slept restfully and stayed very comfortable-never woke up cold, complained being uncomfortable etc.-both trips. Excellent bag, excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, warm, cute, inexpensive sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag, especially for the price. We went camping and my 4 year old loved it. He was warm all night and he loved the camo print. I would not have imagined that this was only $20.00, I would have paid $50 probably! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to be great quality but used once by a 3 and 5 year old and one of them has pulled seams. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Coleman Plum Fun 45 Youth Sleeping Bag
product_meta.description: Keep the kids comfortable as they sleep under the stars with the Coleman Youth Sleeping Bag, even when it's 45 °F outside. ThermoTech insulation helps keep them comfortable all night long.
feature_bullets: Youth sleeping bag for camping in mild temperatures as low as 45°F
Can accommodate children up to 5 feet 5 inches tall
ThermoTech insulation and ComfortCuff help keep kids cozy
Interior pocket for flashlight or other small items
ZipPlow system plows away fabric to prevent snagging during zipping

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
